definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: In this paper, the state estimation problem for the singular discrete stochastic linear systems is dia-cussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了广义离散随机线性系统的状态估计问题。

sentences.english: The relationship between positivity and optimality for linear time-invaiant systems is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论定常线性系统的正性和最优性之间的关系。

sentences.english: Its phase response has strict definition and meaning especially for linear system.
sentences.chinese: 特别是线性系统，相位响应有其严格的定义和意义。

sentences.english: Then the definition of boundary value matrix for multi-multiplication interval linear systems is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 对于多乘性区间线性系统，给出边界值矩阵的定义。

sentences.english: Each member of these sequences is a solution of singular linear systems which can explicitly be computed.
sentences.chinese: 所构造序列是线性系统的解，所以较易计算。

sentences.english: Control redundancy and reconfiguration condition of nonlinear system are given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了线性系统的控制冗余和可重构条件。

sentences.english: It is found that the proposed method is particulary suitable for the system of piecewise linearity.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析方法对分段线性系统极为有效。

sentences.english: The properties of predictive control for the state feedback model are studied by using the linear sytem theories.
sentences.chinese: 应用线性系统理论对预估控制系统进行了理论分析。

sentences.english: The analysis and design of piecewise linear systems is the main contents of this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本论文主要研究分段线性系统的控制问题。

definition: field of complex numbers (math.), usually denoted by C
